files.patch:
@@ -66,1 +66,1 @@
-    runs-on: "ubuntu-20.04"
+    runs-on: "ubuntu-22.04"
@@ -91,2 +91,2 @@
-          sudo apt-get install libgl1-mesa-dev libx11-dev libxxf86vm-dev libxt-dev pkg-config libgtk2.0-dev libgtk-3-dev libxtst-dev gcc-11 g++-11
-          sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/gcc gcc /usr/bin/gcc-11 100 --slave /usr/bin/g++ g++ /usr/bin/g++-11
+          sudo apt-get install libgl1-mesa-dev libx11-dev libxxf86vm-dev libxt-dev pkg-config libgtk2.0-dev libgtk-3-dev libxtst-dev gcc-12 g++-12
+          sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/gcc gcc /usr/bin/gcc-12 100 --slave /usr/bin/g++ g++ /usr/bin/g++-12

@@ -104,3 +104,3 @@
